TopicTitle: Having comm problems, don't know if mods are messing it up

Articles.Content:
I have no comm connection even on my relay sats, let alone on the ground.  I don't know if any mods are involved in messing this up but no matter what antennae I put on my craft.

What can I do about it?

Without knowing anything about things like which antennae you've used, whether they are deployed or not, the level of your tracking station, distance from Kerbin AND your game settings nobody will be able to give a definitive answer.

In other words: To answer your question we'll need a lot more info.
No antennae work, of course they're deployed, I'm playing sandbox, so max tracking station.  No matter where I am even on the ground I have no comm connection.  None of my ships have any comms.

KSP.log please

Providing the above file it will help with figuring out what is going on ... use dropbox or google drive to upload a .zip copy of the KSP.log as well as your output.log

Without these no one will be able to help all that much except by speculating which would be hit or miss (mostly miss)

I have OneDrive, I hope you can read it with there.  I think you need their account for it.

https://1drv.ms/u/s!Anutp2phLkRFgQwk76r2IArJ05bo

I looked through the KSP.log myself a little, and seeing as how about 80% of it is talking about CommNet, I suspect that the game might be having some trouble with CommNet.

Edited March 9, 2017 by SlabGizor117

KSP.log please

Providing the above file it will help with figuring out what is going on ... use dropbox or google drive to upload a .zip copy of the KSP.log as well as your output.log

Without these no one will be able to help all that much except by speculating which would be hit or miss (mostly miss)
